name: CornavirusTheCure (2K/4KScreenMonitor)
description: You play as a son of a family who got distraught at work noticing something was going terribly wrong. People started coughing around you, paranoia began in family. You must find your way out of infected situations risking and thinking smart logically, and wear your mask of course, but be careful all things are limited, and you need to risk wisely, not to get severely infected, when running around your environment. Trying to collect Ampules, cures, and recovery drugs. As if you don't think deeply the virus will damage you deeply and you'll not be able to survive to develop the cure. Save every inch of health you can. Or else it might be death before you get to safety. Explore wisely and know It's a challenge.
